body.raw:
# Alert Displays a description for the user's attention. ## Installation ## Import - **AlertRoot**: All parts of the alert are included. - **AlertStatusIcon**: Alert icon changes depending on status. - **AlertContent**: The content of the alert to be announced by screen readers. ### Another way to import ```js 'use client'; import { Alert } from '@melio-ui/alert'; Content1 ; ``` > 'use client' must be used when rendering on the server side. ## API Reference ### AlertRoot All parts of the alert are included. TypeAttributes.Status

TypeAttributes.Status: "info" | "success" | "warning" | "error" ), description: 'The status of the alert.', }, ]} /> ### AlertStatusIcon Alert icon changes depending on status. ', type: 'React.ReactNode', description: 'displaying an icon for info status.', }, { name: 'success', required: false, default: '', type: 'React.ReactNode', description: 'displaying an icon for success status.', }, { name: 'warning', required: false, default: '', type: 'React.ReactNode', description: 'displaying an icon for warning status.', }, { name: 'error', required: false, default: '', type: 'React.ReactNode', description: 'displaying an icon for error status.', }, ]} /> ### AlertContent The content of the alert to be announced by screen readers. ## Examples ### Set the status value ```jsx This is an success alert ``` ### Custom ```jsx
information
This is an info alert
 ```
